---
title: "delete-cw-data.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines a function `deleteCwPatientData` that deletes CommonWell patient data associated with a given patient ID and customer ID. It first checks if the data exists, and if so, it deletes it from the database.

## Symbols

### `deleteCwPatientData`
#### Description
This asynchronous function deletes CommonWell patient data for a given patient.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| patientDelete | CwPatientDataDelete | An object containing the patient ID and customer ID |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| - | Promise&lt;void&gt; | A promise that resolves when the operation is complete |

#### Internal Logic
1. Destructure the `id` and `cxId` from the input `patientDelete` object.
2. Call `getCwPatientData` to retrieve the CommonWell patient data.
3. If the data exists, call the `destroy()` method on the retrieved data to delete it from the database.

## References
- `BaseUpdateCmdWithCustomer`: Type imported from "../../../../command/medical/base-update-command"
- `getCwPatientData`: Function imported from "./get-cw-data"

## Dependencies
The code relies on the following external dependencies:
| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| BaseUpdateCmdWithCustomer | Provides the type definition for the input parameter |
| getCwPatientData | Retrieves the CommonWell patient data from the database |

## Error Handling
The function does not implement explicit error handling. Any errors thrown by `getCwPatientData` or the `destroy()` method will propagate up the call stack.
